Others: Miami Heat (3-5, 10th in the Eastern Conference) vs. Minnesota Timberwolves (6-3, fourth in the Western Conference)
The game is scheduled for Sunday, 7 p.m. EST in Minneapolis
Last season, Minnesota finished with a record of 56-26 overall and 30-11 at home, while Miami finished with a record of 46-36 overall, 32-20 in Eastern Conference action and 24-17 on the road
